price: 13. Ceux qui disent : « Notre Seigneur c’est Allah », puis font preuve de droiture, n’auront aucune crainte pour eux-mêmes ni aucune affliction.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna qālū rabbunā al-lahu thumma is'taqāmū falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
